static String getOpenSourceSoftwareLicenseInfo(Context context) Returns the open source software license information for the Google Play services application, or null if Google Play services is not available on this device.
static Context getRemoteContext(Context context) This gets the Context object of the Buddy APK.
static Resources getRemoteResource(Context context) This gets the Resources object of the Buddy APK.

static int isGooglePlayServicesAvailable(Context context) Verifies that Google Play services is installed and enabled on this device, and that the version installed on this device is no older than the one required by this client.
